name: Touhou Fangame ~ Crino's untold story
description:
In this game you play as Reimu.

---CONTROLLS---------------------------------------------
>Shoot with Z
>mouve with the arrows
>Focus with X
>Bomb with SPACE BAR
--------------------------------------------------------------
the menu works like a touhou menu
(z = confirm and x = cancel)
--------------------------------------------------------------
Replay does not work but everything else does.

Touhou music,characters and etc. belong to Team Shanghai Alice (Zun)

http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/

Other pictures in game belong to their rightful owners.
